dk.aau.cs.giraf.savannah.serverConnection

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • dk.aau.cs.giraf.savannah.serverConnection.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    It is recommended that this class is run in its own Thread. This is because it can block the Thread it is run in. The reason for this is that it internally tries to read from an InputStream, however if there is no data to read, it will block the Thread until some data is read.
    Author:
    Thorbjørn Kvist Nielsen

    • Constructor Detail

      • Connection

        public Connection(java.lang.String folderPath,
          int bufferSize)
           throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                  java.io.IOException
        Constructs a Connection object from the specified arguments
        Parameters:
        folderPath - - the specified path for storing received files
        bufferSize - - the specified buffer size to use. Default value can be seen in ConnectionConfiguration.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - - thrown if the Server cannot be found.
        java.io.IOException - - thrown if folderPath is null.

                  java.io.IOException
        Constructs a Connection object from the specified arguments
        Parameters:
        folderPath - - the specified path for storing received files
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - - thrown if the Server cannot be found.
        java.io.IOException - - thrown if folderPath is null.

    • Method Detail

      • sendCommit

        public java.lang.String sendCommit(java.lang.String xml,
                          java.io.File... files)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        This method sends a Commit Event to the Server.
        Parameters:
        xml - - the specified xml
        files - - the specified files
        Returns:
        - A String from the Server explaining what happened
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - If the internal Socket could not connect. If any of the specified files could not be found. If the Connection cannot receive the String from the Server

        f - - the specified file
        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - If the internal Socket could not connect. If the specified file could not be found. If the Connection cannot receive the String from the Server

      • sendPing

        public long sendPing(int pingSize)
              throws java.io.IOException
        This method sends a Ping to the Server.
        Parameters:
        pingSize - - the amount of specified bytes to use for the Ping. The pingSize can be between 1 and 4096 bytes. The default pingSize value is 32 bytes.
        Returns:
        - A long representing the time used by the Ping function. The return value is equal to System.currentTimeMillis().
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - If the internal Socket could not connect. If the Connection cannot receive Ping responds from the Server.

      • sendRequest

        public TransmissionHandler sendRequest(java.lang.String xml)
                                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                       java.io.IOException
        This method sends a Request Event to the Server.
        Parameters:
        xml - - the specified xml
        Returns:
        - A TransmissionHandler object that contains all the data and references for any files received.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - - If the files received could not be written to the HDD.
        java.io.IOException - - If the internal Socket could not connect. If the Connection cannot receive a TransmissionHandler from the Server. If the files received could not be written to the HDD.
